title: Drawing, "International Casino: Ladies Powder Room Furniture", July 9, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 546-79; INT. CAS.; Olsson/July 9-37; 7/9/37 1 EMPIRE CHAIR / " 1 BRECKER / " 1 WEISS / 8/" 1 EMPIRE; lower center: COVER:/OYSTER WHITE DURALEATHER/#374A
description: Perspective, plan, and elevations for furniture and interior of ladies' powder room. Low, five-seat upholstered sofa along left wall, phone booth at left of sofa. Mirror covering length of far wall, with eight low stools facing mirror; circular upholstered seats with four tapered legs. Mirror along near wall with six stools. Specifications at left for two stool designs. Sofa and stools upholstered in white dura-leather.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Ladies Powder Room Furniture", July 9, 1937.
July 9, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-220.
